ygData.subject: Re: Prexus Server
ygData.msgSnippet: It might not be advisable for us to go into race war server bcoz we all tend to create chars using diff races.  Only if we all decided to create chars under
ygData.messageBody:
It might not be advisable for us to go into race war server bcoz we all
tend to create chars using diff races. Only if we all decided to create
chars under one race group (eg all elves, dwarves & gnomish), then we can
work as a team.

Gotta settle on "the" server fast, so that we can concentrate full force in
it. Playing in several servers can be a pain in the ass - no time to play
liao, not to talk abt training/hunting. Last night I started the game with
lvl 4, which mean I can mediate liao. Just spending time in town maximising
all my spells skills (except conjuration) aleady took me 2 hrs or so.
Without much crowd at ard 11pm plus, I got lots of stuffs to hunt outside
gnome city. Nevertheless, it still took me 2-3 hrs to gain lvl 5. Now
most of the stuffs outside gnome city is green to me, I need to find
companions to hunt bigger monsters, anyone wanna team with me?

Btw, the highest lvl at my zone last night is a lvl 8 magi and a lvl 8
necro. Both of them 'booked' the Kobold camp yesterday and the day b4 -
they just station their pets there and killed all kobolds spawned, I really
evny they. Too bad a wiz is destinated to walk a very hard life, esp in
the begining. Now I start to face my own problem - I cant solo when facing
those lvl 5 monsters further always from town, yet it's hard to find tanks
in Ak'Anon coz most of the gnomes I met are magery classes, since gnome is
more suitable for such classes.

Appreciate anyone who can enlighten me how to go Butcherblock SAFETY so
that I can take a boat to FP for more huntings - since FP is a big city,
chances of getting a well-balanced party is higher.

Mondain (Gnomish Wizard, Prexus)
